name.fil: OneTab: Mas mahusay na Pamamahala ng Tab
name.id: OneTab: Manajemen Tab yang Lebih Baik
name.ja: OneTab: より優れたタブ管理
name.ms: OneTab: Pengurusan Tab yang Lebih Baik
name.ro: OneTab: o mai bună gestionare a filelor
name.th: OneTab: การจัดการแท็บที่ดีขึ้น
name.vi: OneTab: Quản lý tab tốt hơn

short.ar: يمكنك توفير ما يصل إلى 95% من الذاكرة عن طريق تقليل حمل وحدة المعالجة المركزية وتقليل فوضى علامات التبويب.
short.am: የሲፒዩ ጭነትን በመቀነስ እና የትር ዝርክርክነትን በመቀነስ እስከ 95% ማህደረ ትውስታን ይቆጥቡ።
short.bg: Спестете до 95% памет чрез намаляване на натоварването на процесора и намаляване на безпорядъка в разделите.
short.bn: CPU লোড কমিয়ে এবং ট্যাব ক্লাটার কমিয়ে 95% পর্যন্ত মেমরি সংরক্ষণ করুন।
short.ca: Estalvieu fins a un 95% de memòria reduint la càrrega de la CPU i reduint el desordre de pestanyes.
short.cs: Ušetřete až 95 % paměti snížením zatížení procesoru a snížením zbytečnosti karet.
short.da: Spar op til 95 % hukommelse ved at reducere CPU-belastningen og Reducer Tab Clutter.
short.de: Sparen Sie bis zu 95 % Speicher, indem Sie die CPU-Last reduzieren und Tab-Unordnung reduzieren.
short.el: Εξοικονομήστε έως και 95% μνήμη μειώνοντας το φορτίο της CPU και Μειώστε την ακαταστασία των καρτελών.
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US: Save up to 95% Memory by reducing the CPU load and Reduce Tab Clutter.
short.es,es_419: Ahorre hasta un 95 % de memoria reduciendo la carga de la CPU y reduciendo el desorden de pestañas.
short.et: Säästke kuni 95% mälu, vähendades protsessori koormust ja vahelehtede segadust.
short.fa: با کاهش بار CPU و کاهش شلوغی تب تا 95 درصد در حافظه صرفه جویی کنید.
short.fi: Säästä jopa 95 % muistia vähentämällä prosessorin kuormitusta ja vähentämällä välilehtien sotkua.
short.fil: Makatipid ng hanggang 95% Memory sa pamamagitan ng pagbabawas ng CPU load at Bawasan ang Tab Clutter.
short.fr: Économisez jusqu'à 95 % de mémoire en réduisant la charge du processeur et en réduisant l'encombrement des onglets.
short.gu: CPU લોડ ઘટાડીને અને ટૅબ ક્લટર ઘટાડીને 95% સુધી મેમરી બચાવો.
short.he: חסוך עד 95% זיכרון על ידי הפחתת עומס המעבד והפחתת עומס הכרטיסיות.
short.hi: सीपीयू लोड को कम करके और टैब अव्यवस्था को कम करके 95% तक मेमोरी बचाएं।
short.hr: Uštedite do 95% memorije smanjenjem opterećenja CPU-a i smanjenjem nereda na kartici.
short.hu: Takarítson meg akár 95% memóriát a CPU terhelés csökkentésével és a lapok zsúfoltságának csökkentésével.
short.id: Menghemat Memori hingga 95% dengan mengurangi beban CPU dan Mengurangi Kekacauan Tab.
short.it: Risparmia fino al 95% di memoria riducendo il carico della CPU e riducendo il disordine delle schede.
short.ja: CPU 負荷を軽減し、タブの煩雑さを軽減することで、メモリを最大 95% 節約します。
short.kn: CPU ಲೋಡ್ ಅನ್ನು ಕಡಿಮೆ ಮಾಡುವ ಮೂಲಕ 95% ಮೆಮೊರಿಯನ್ನು ಉಳಿಸಿ ಮತ್ತು ಟ್ಯಾಬ್ ಅಸ್ತವ್ಯಸ್ತತೆಯನ್ನು ಕಡಿಮೆ ಮಾಡಿ.
short.ko: CPU 부하를 줄이고 탭 클러터를 줄여 메모리를 최대 95% 절약하세요.
short.lt: Sutaupykite iki 95 % atminties sumažindami procesoriaus apkrovą ir sumažindami skirtukų netvarką.
short.lv: Ietaupiet līdz pat 95% atmiņas, samazinot centrālā procesora slodzi un samazinot cilnes jucekli.
short.ml: സിപിയു ലോഡ് കുറയ്ക്കുകയും ടാബ് ക്ലട്ടർ കുറയ്ക്കുകയും ചെയ്യുന്നതിലൂടെ 95% മെമ്മറി വരെ സംരക്ഷിക്കുക.
short.mr: CPU लोड कमी करून 95% पर्यंत मेमरी जतन करा आणि टॅब गोंधळ कमी करा.
short.ms: Jimat sehingga 95% Memori dengan mengurangkan beban CPU dan Mengurangkan Kekusutan Tab.
short.nl: Bespaar tot 95% geheugen door de CPU-belasting te verminderen en de rommel op tabbladen te verminderen.
short.no: Spar opptil 95 % minne ved å redusere CPU-belastningen og Reduser Tab Clutter.
short.pl: Zaoszczędź do 95% pamięci, zmniejszając obciążenie procesora i zmniejszając bałagan na kartach.
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Economize até 95% de memória, reduzindo a carga da CPU e reduzindo a confusão de guias.
short.ro: Economisiți până la 95% memorie prin reducerea încărcării procesorului și reducerea aglomerației de file.
short.ru: Экономьте до 95% памяти за счет снижения нагрузки на процессор и уменьшения беспорядка на вкладках.
short.sk: Ušetrite až 95 % pamäte znížením zaťaženia procesora a znížením množstva kariet.
short.sl: Prihranite do 95 % pomnilnika z zmanjšanjem obremenitve procesorja in zmanjšanjem nereda na zavihkih.
short.sr: Уштедите до 95% меморије смањењем оптерећења ЦПУ-а и смањењем нереда картица.
short.sv: Spara upp till 95 % minne genom att minska CPU-belastningen och minska flikklutter.
short.sw: Okoa hadi 95% ya Kumbukumbu kwa kupunguza upakiaji wa CPU na Punguza Mchanganyiko wa Kichupo.
short.ta: CPU சுமையை குறைப்பதன் மூலம் 95% நினைவகத்தை சேமிக்கவும் மற்றும் தாவல் ஒழுங்கீனத்தை குறைக்கவும்.
short.te: CPU లోడ్‌ను తగ్గించడం మరియు ట్యాబ్ అయోమయ స్థితిని తగ్గించడం ద్వారా 95% మెమరీని ఆదా చేసుకోండి.
short.th: ประหยัดสูงสุดถึง 95% หน่วยความจำโดยการลดภาระของ CPU และลดความยุ่งเหยิงของแท็บ
short.tr: CPU yükünü azaltarak ve Sekme Dağınıklığını Azaltarak %95'e kadar Bellekten tasarruf edin.
short.uk: Економте до 95% пам’яті, зменшивши навантаження на процесор і зменшивши захаращеність вкладок.
short.vi: Tiết kiệm tới 95% bộ nhớ bằng cách giảm tải CPU và giảm sự lộn xộn của tab.
short.zh_CN,zh_TW: 通过减少 CPU 负载和减少选项卡混乱，节省高达 95% 的内存。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,e:
Too many tabs? Convert it to a list and reduce browser memory upto 95% of your RAM.

OneTab is indeed a helpful tool if you work with hundreds of open tags and on multiple windows. Nobody wants to get themselves into a muddle by switching between too many tags. Also, many times a random web search turns into long surfing where only unmindful things occur. Thus, people lose track of time and productivity, plus they lose the fact of what they were looking at on the web. Furthermore, many professionals' jobs need them to open an excessive number of labels and connections. Therefore, you can put in a little extra work to clear the clutter and be free with a single click. 

Features:

=> Easy Transfer - You may quickly export and import your tags as a list of URLs. Furthermore, you can convert them into a web page, making it accessible to share with others.

=> Complete Management - You can reorder tags and restore them while holding down the Ctrl or Cmd key, and they will stay in your OneTab list. 

=> Free To Use - It is a free service with no commercial intent. Furthermore, it was made for every professional in the world who works with numerous labels to ease their job. 

=> Dark mode - Dark theme available. Thus, you can switch to the dark setting as per your preference. 

=> Named Tab Groups - Click on "More" and then you get the option for a quick way to name a label group. This will bring up a box where you may give your label group a name.

=> Stared Tab Groups - Like bookmarking, you can star your tags by tapping on the “More..” and they will appear in the order you pointed them.

=> Locked Tab Groups - You can safeguard your list of labels from any accidental happening.     

=> Keyboard Shortcuts - You can use the following keyboard shortcut:
By navigating to chrome:/extensions/shortcuts, you can set up keyboard shortcuts for rapid access to extension capabilities like Alt + Shift + O – (Display OneTab).  

=> Options Screen - Click the 'Options' link. You can modify your pinned labels, choose which window to restore tags to, start preferences, and how duplicate tags are handled.

=> Drag And Drop Reordering - In your OneTab list, you can drag and drop tags to reorder them.

=> Cooldown - It will stash all the opened labels in a list to make things convenient for you. Furthermore, OneTab can help your computer run faster and cool down by lowering CPU stress.

=> Data Safety - You don't have to worry about closing OneTab, you will not lose anything. Even if you shut down your device and exit your web browser, it will be there always until you delete them.

Privacy Assurance:

We never save or use any of your personal information in any case as we take this matter very seriously. You can enjoy the extension hassle-free.

Therefore, you can put in a little extra work to clear the clutter and be free with a single click. 

Features:

=> Easy Transfer - You may quickly export and import your tags as a list of URLs. Furthermore, you can convert them into a web page, making it accessible to share with others.

=> Free To Use - It is a free service with no commercial intent. Furthermore, it was made for every professional in the world who works with numerous labels to ease their job.

=> Locked Tab Groups - You can safeguard your list of labels from any accidental happening.     

=> Keyboard Shortcuts - You can use the following keyboard shortcut:
By navigating to chrome:/extensions/shortcuts, you can set up keyboard shortcuts for rapid access to extension capabilities like Alt + Shift + O – (Display OneTab).  

=> Options Screen - Click the 'Options' link. You can modify your pinned labels, choose which window to restore tags to, start preferences, and how duplicate tags are handled.

=> Drag And Drop Reordering - In your OneTab list, you can drag and drop tags to reorder them.

=> Cooldown - It will stash all the opened labels in a list to make things convenient for you. Furthermore, OneTab can help your computer run faster and cool down by lowering CPU stress.

Privacy Assurance:

We never save or use any of your personal information in any case as we take this matter very seriously. You can enjoy the extension hassle-free.

Disclosure/Consent:

OneTab enhances your browsing experience by providing useful features and participating in affiliate programs. This helps sustain the service without affecting the cost of your purchases. Explicit consent is required before any affiliate code is applied, and you have full control over this feature. Learn more in our Privacy Policy (https://www.onetab.one/privacy-policy/), Terms of Use (https://www.onetab.one/terms-of-use/), and Affiliate Disclosure (https://www.onetab.one/affiliate-disclosure/).

Thank you for choosing OneTab. We are committed to continually improving your online experience.
